page.title: 17ST. PAUL'S R.C. CHURCH
page.content:
{St.Budoc}built a little church in Ernesettle Wood in 482.
In 1482 a small church with tower and three bell was built in Ernesettle at the request of John Ernesettle to the Bishop of Exeter.
A new church was built in St.Budeaux for Protestants,completed in 1563 and still serves the community.
{St.Paul's R.C Church} In 1933 the former St.Budeaux Horse Show and Football Fields became the site of St.Paul's Catholic Church.When the Bishop laid the foundation stone newspapers were strewn across the un_made,muddy Pemros Road for him.The Church is a fine reproduction of Romanesque architecture. Cont.
